message.raw:
Fix bug with gazebo_detection and make gzdev spawn run in the background

pgrep should look for a gzserver process instead of a gazebo process
and gzdev spawn should run as a background process so that spawn.py
so that the build script can continue and detect whether gazebo is
running, otherwise it will hang as spawn.py is logging the output
of gazebo running in the docker container.

message:
Fix bug with gazebo_detection and make gzdev spawn run in the background

pgrep should look for a gzserver process instead of a gazebo process
and gzdev spawn should run as a background process so that spawn.py
so that the build script can continue and detect whether gazebo is
running, otherwise it will hang as spawn.py is logging the output
of gazebo running in the docker container.
